articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: DEQ issued Douglas County a $35,270 penalty for failing to conduct required methane monitoring at the Roseburg Landfill from 2022 to 2024. Regulators say the lapse is a serious violation that delayed safety checks and gave the county an economic advantage by avoiding monitoring costs.
articles.title: DEQ fines Douglas County $35,270 for methane violations at Roseburg Landfill
